s.text: Susan Page ( Late Edition ) says that a new Giuliani TV ad questioning Hillary's devotion to Israel is smart, because the Jews are one of the few swing votes left.

Susan Page ( Late Edition ) says that a new Giuliani TV ad questioning Hillary's devotion to Israel is smart, because the Jews are one of the few swing votes left.
Tucker Carlson ( Late Edition ) argues that Steve Forbes' poor showing in the Time poll (8 percent), despite his millions of dollars, should give pause to advocates of campaign-finance reform.
Tucker Carlson ( Late Edition ) argues that Steve Forbes' poor showing in the Time poll (8 percent), despite his millions of dollars, should give pause to advocates of campaign-finance reform.

But Steve Roberts ( Late Edition ) says that Bush's New Hampshire numbers will improve once he spends some time there, and Matthew Rees ( NewsHour ) thinks that McCain's New Hampshire numbers have peaked.
